messages.text:
‚ùóÔ∏è To implement ABA KHQR on mobile integration, you can add payment_option "abapay_khqr_deeplink".  The API will respond to you as JSON data, and  the response includes "abapay_deeplink", which you need to configure to open the ABA APP, and "checkout_qr_url" is the webpage url you render on the webview.

Here is the scenario your side must handle :

üîπüÖ∞Ô∏è. If there is an ABA APP on the user's device, you must launch and open the ABA APP for payment. If they click the back arrow in the ABA APP and return to your app, you should display the "qr_checkout_url" on the mobile web view.

üîπüÖ±Ô∏è. If the user does not have the ABA APP on their device, it will show a normal QR code (checkout_qr_url) and can be scanned with any member banking app (in Sandbox you cannot scan with others banking APP; this is for production use only).

text_entities.text:
‚ùóÔ∏è To implement ABA KHQR on mobile integration, you can add payment_option "abapay_khqr_deeplink".  The API will respond to you as JSON data, and  the response includes "abapay_deeplink", which you need to configure to open the ABA APP, and "checkout_qr_url" is the webpage url you render on the webview.

Here is the scenario your side must handle :

üîπüÖ∞Ô∏è. If there is an ABA APP on the user's device, you must launch and open the ABA APP for payment. If they click the back arrow in the ABA APP and return to your app, you should display the "qr_checkout_url" on the mobile web view.

üîπüÖ±Ô∏è. If the user does not have the ABA APP on their device, it will show a normal QR code (checkout_qr_url) and can be scanned with any member banking app (in Sandbox you cannot scan with others banking APP; this is for production use only).

text:
CONGRATULATION ON GOLIVE 
 
Hello All 
 
Thanks for your collaboration and congratulations on going live with PayWay, as part of go live PayWay team offer VIP support for 2 weeks after confirm Go live.  
 
Integration team members will remain in the group for 2 more weeks help you with any issues related to PayWay , That you may face in production. 
 
After 2 weeks Digital Support team will be your first point of contact via email or phone for any further support after Integration team members will leave this group. 
 
Any future communication after two weeks of VIP Support shall be directed to . 
‚Ä¢Email:
